About the Company: Strides Arcolab Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture of pharmaceutical dosage forms in branded as well generic categories. The dosages are manufactured in form of tablets, capsules, soft gelatin capsules, parenterals and semi-solids.The product range of the company includes Soft gel capsules- The company manufactures range of soft gel in category of nutraceuticals, Rx, specialty OTCs and immunosuppressants.Steriles- Under this, it offers its products in therapeutic segments that includes beta-lactams and cephalosporins. The company manufactures striles in various forms such as prefill syringes, ampoules, vials and penicillins.
